entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon then 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:32 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
